translation.searchProvideAssistance: Touse, you need to authorize through Power_Wallet
translation.IfYouDontHavePowerWallet: If you don't have a Power_Wallet, create one and get full access to all features
translation.defaultErrorMessage: An error occurred in the application. If it repeats or interferes with your work, contact support.
translation.name: Name
translation.toPostAnNFTYouNeedToGenerate:
To post an NFT, you need to generate an NFT token (Non-fungible token). 

After that you can save the NFT and send it to the editor.
translation.byChoosingSubscription: By choosing a subscription, you will always have access to advanced features and get published.
translation.tariff1Description: This tariff is ideal for authors, researchers, and press service representatives of scientific organizations who wish to share their discoveries with the scientific community and are ready to distribute their texts independently.
translation.tariff1List:
Creation and submission of NFTs for moderation
Access to the basic set of editing tools
Ability to receive feedback from moderators
Publication of NFTs on the platform in your own blog
Access to platform materials and resources
translation.tariff2Description: Designed for active members of the scientific community who want to use additional tools to promote information about their research and developments. Suitable for active scientific groups and startups.
translation.tariff2List: Includes all the benefits of the 'Member' tariff
translation.tariff3Description: Suitable for everyone who wants to maximize their presence in the scientific world but is not ready to independently write popular texts. This tariff offers exclusive support and maximum visibility of your publications.
translation.tariff3List: Includes all the benefits of the 'Author' tariff
translation.thisSecureStepIsNecessary: This secure  step is necessary to authorize your action within the DApp
translation.yourDigitalSignatureIsASafeguard: Your digital signature is a safeguard,  ensuring that all activities are explicitly consented by you and keeping  your blockchain account safe
translation.youDontHaveAnyNFTsYet: You don't have any NFTs yet
